author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 55-year-old man was fatally knocked down by the Chennai – Madurai Vaigai Express between Samuthram and Manapparai railway stations on the Tiruchi–Madurai broad gauge section on Tuesday night.

Railway police identified the victim as R. Marimuthu of Kallukaranpatti in Pudukottai district. The man was crossing the track when he was fatally knocked down by the express train, the police said. The Government Railway Police, Tiruchi, have registered a case.
title: Train knocks down man
